summary: This MOD is a standalone. do not need other MOD.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][b]Standalone Follower Arlenne[/b]

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1969899-1423758607.jpg[/img]

[/size][size=6][b]Version1.1 Updated:[/b] 15/02/2015
[size=3]Fixed Skeleton and skin ([/size][size=6][size=3]For more information, please see the image[/size][/size][size=3])[/size]
[/size]


[youtube]jLxckYNJkxA[/youtube]
Mr.Slytra made a Arlenne followers Video. Thank you!


[size=4]BASIC INFO[/size]
Name: Arlenne
Gender: Female
Voice: [size=4]Female Orc[/size] (Can be changed in the options file)
Levels from 10-100
Combat Style: Two Handed
Armor Prefrence: Heavy Armor
Favorite Weapon: Two Handed weapons
Is Essential?: Yes
Location: Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood

[size=4]REQUIREMENTS[/size]
- Skyrim 1.9.32

[size=4]Recommended[/size]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]FaceLight[/url] (Not necessary though unless you want Arlenne to look the same as in the screenshots)
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50325/?]Animated Idle[/url] (Cool male standing Idle)
[size=4]INSTALLATION[/size]
NMM or MO:
- download the file
- simply install

[size=4]MANUAL:[/size]
- download main file
- extract files with winRAR
- copy all the files you extracted then paste it in your data folder
- open your SkyrimLauncher or whatever mod manager you are using
- activate the mod
- start skyrim and have fun


[size=4]Caution[/size]
If you are using the ENB, and her eyebrows shine
Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49168/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D49168&pUp=1]"Eyebrow Specularity Fix"[/url] and Please copy
This MOD's "femalebrow_n.dds"   to  "Textures / Actor / Character / ArlenneFollower"

[size=4]Credit[/size]

TroubleMakers Clothing - UNPB UNP BBP BBPx TBBP MTM HDT-PE Female Body Replacer
SG Textures Renewal UNP
univision Face
KijikoHair
Eye Colours with New Style
Enhanced Character Edit
XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS
